languages.text: "Допрос пленных показал, что в Комморре произошел инцидент, называемый нелюдьми... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}дизъюнкцией{/d}. Пространственная катастрофа, вынудившая ксеносов усилить свои рейды в реальном мире. Похоже, их дерзость объясняется отчаянием — которое, в свою очередь, выливается в новые испытания для слуг Его".

traits.locale_text: "Допрос пленных показал, что в Комморре произошел инцидент, называемый нелюдьми... Дизъюнкцией. Пространственная катастрофа, вынудившая ксеносов усилить свои рейды в реальном мире. Похоже, их дерзость объясняется отчаянием — которое, в свою очередь, выливается в новые испытания для слуг Его".

languages.text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."
languages.original_text: "Допрос пленных показал, что в Комморре произошел инцидент, называемый нелюдьми... {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}дизъюнкцией{/d}. Пространственная катастрофа, вынудившая ксеносов усилить свои рейды в реальном мире. Похоже, их дерзость объясняется отчаянием — которое, в свою очередь, выливается в новые испытания для слуг Его".

traits.locale_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in Commorragh, what the inhumans call a dysjunction. A dimensional calamity that forced the xenos to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

"Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in Commorragh, what the inhumans call a dysjunction. A dimensional calamity that forced the xenos to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

"Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in Commorragh, what the inhumans call a dysjunction. A dimensional calamity that forced the xenos to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

"Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

languages.text: “我们审讯了一部分囚犯。他们的供词表明，黑暗之城发生了一起事故，他们称之为{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}空间离析{/d}。由于异形的空间发生了变故，他们不得不加强对真实世界的袭击。他们肆无忌惮的举动，正说明他们已经被逼得走投无路，而这又为神皇的仆人带来了新的考验。”
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

traits.locale_text: “我们审讯了一部分囚犯。他们的供词表明，科摩罗发生了一起事故，他们称之为‘空间离析’。由于异形的空间发生了变故，他们不得不加强对真实世界的袭击。他们肆无忌惮的举动，正说明他们已经被逼得走投无路，而这又为神皇的仆人带来了新的考验。”

languages.text: «Al interrogar prisioneros hemos descubierto que se ha producido un incidente en la Ciudad Siniestra, algo que los xenos llaman una {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}disyunción{/d}. Una calamidad dimensional que los ha obligado a aumentar sus incursiones en el espacio real. Su atrevimiento refleja su desesperación, que sin duda ocasionará más problemas para los sirvientes del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

traits.locale_text: «Al interrogar prisioneros hemos descubierto que se ha producido un incidente en Commorragh, algo que los no humanos llaman una disyunción. Es una calamidad dimensional que obliga a los xenos a aumentar sus incursiones en el espacio real. Su atrevimiento refleja su desesperación, que sin duda ocasionará más problemas para los sirvientes del Emperador».

languages.text: 「捕虜を尋問したところ、仄暗き都でとある出来事が起きたことが分かった。異種族が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}分離{/d}と呼ぶ事態だ。次元の厄災により、異種族はリアルスペースへの襲撃に力を入れざるを得なくなった。大胆な行いは死に物狂いの証明だ、皇帝の臣下にとって、今度は新たな試練となると言えよう」
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

traits.locale_text: 「捕虜を尋問したところ、仄暗き都でとある出来事が起きたことが分かった。異種族が{d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}分離{/d}と呼ぶ事態だ。次元の厄災により、異種族はリアルスペースへの襲撃に力を入れざるを得なくなった。大胆な行いは死に物狂いの証明だ、皇帝の臣下にとって、今度は新たな試練となると言えよう」

languages.text: « À en croire les interrogatoires de prisonniers, un incident serait survenu dans la Cité Crépusculaire, ce que les xénos appellent une {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}disjonction{/d} : un désastre dimensionnel qui les a forcés à multiplier leurs assauts dans l'espace réel. La témérité de leurs actes indique clairement qu'ils sont désespérés, ce qui augure de nouvelles épreuves pour les serviteurs de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

traits.locale_text: « À en croire les interrogatoires de prisonniers, un incident serait survenu dans la Cité Crépusculaire, ce que les xénos appellent une {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}disjonction{/d} : un désastre dimensionnel qui les a forcés à multiplier leurs assauts dans l'espace réel. La témérité de leurs actes indique clairement qu'ils sont désespérés, ce qui augure de nouvelles épreuves pour les serviteurs de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: "Verhöre von Gefangenen deuten auf einen Vorfall in der Dunklen Stadt hin, den die Xenos eine {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}Disjunktion{/d} nennen. Eine Dimensionskatastrophe, die sie dazu zwang, ihre Angriffe im Realraum zu verstärken. Ihre Kühnheit dabei zeugt von ihrer Verzweiflung, und das wiederum wird zu neuen Prüfungen für Seine Diener führen."
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."

traits.locale_text: "Verhöre von Gefangenen deuten auf einen Vorfall in Commorragh hin, den die Nicht-Menschen eine Disjunktion nennen. Eine Dimensionskatastrophe, die die Xenos dazu zwang, ihre Angriffe im Realraum zu verstärken. Ihre Kühnheit dabei zeugt von ihrer Verzweiflung, und das wiederum wird zu neuen Prüfungen für Seine Diener führen."

"Verhöre von Gefangenen deuten auf einen Vorfall in der Dunklen Stadt hin, den die Xenos eine Disjunktion nennen. Eine Dimensionskatastrophe, die sie dazu zwang, ihre Angriffe im Realraum zu verstärken. Ihre Kühnheit dabei zeugt von ihrer Verzweiflung, und das wiederum wird zu neuen Prüfungen für Seine Diener führen."

languages.text: "Sorguladığımız tutsaklardan aldığımız bilgilere göre Kara Şehir'de bir hadise meydana gelmiş. Zenolar, adına {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}ayrışım{/d} diyormuş. Boyutsal bir felaketmiş, bundan ötürü gerçekuzaydaki baskınlarını artırdılar. Yani cüretleri çaresizliklerinden geliyor. Bu da O'nun hizmetkârları için yeni imtihanlar demek."
languages.original_text: "Prisoner interrogations indicate that an incident occurred in the Dark City, what the xenos call a {d|Encyclopedia:Ch3_DaemonicBreach}dysjunction{/d}. A dimensional calamity that forced them to step up their raids in realspace. Their audacity speaks to their desperation, which in turn will translate into new trials for His servants."
